visual.name: ZebraBICharts
visual.description: One visual, many charts. Waterfall, variance, column, area, line, dot, combo… in small multiples!

dataRoles.description: Add a measure here to chart actual data. Add a second measure to create a combo chart.
dataRoles.name: Values

dataRoles.description: Add a measure for previous year (PY) here to create variance charts.
dataRoles.name: PreviousYear

dataRoles.description: Add a measure for plan or budget here to create variance charts.
dataRoles.name: Plan

dataRoles.description: Add a measure for forecast or estimation here to display forecasts.
dataRoles.name: Forecast

dataRoles.description: Use this bucket to add measures that you want to reference in the visual title or to provide the visual with a filter context. This will make the visual aware of your exact selections in slicers and filters so it can save the created annotations to correct filter states.
dataRoles.name: Filters

invert.description: Invert colors of positive and nagative variance (use this for costs and similar KPIs where growth is bad)

groupTitleSettings.description: Format chart titles in small multiples

dataLabelSettings.description: Format the display of data labels

decimalPlaces.description: Select the number of decimal places to display

decimalPlacesPercentage.description: Select the number of percentage decimal places to display

labelDensity.description: Select the amount of labels displayed on the chart

dotChartDataLabelSettings.description: Format data labels and other settings in combo chart

decimalPlaces.description: Select the number of decimal places to display

labelDensity.description: Select the amount of labels displayed on the chart

dotChartMarkerDensity.description: Select the amount of markers displayed on the chart

categorySettings.description: Manage the display of axis labels and category width

topNOtherLabel.description: Name the 'Others' category when using Top/Bottom N.

designSettings.description: Choose your style or switch to Custom to set fill, line, marker, axis and gridline colors

referenceMarkerFixedSize.description: Reference marker fixed size in px

stackedChartSettings.description: Display stacked chart instead of small multiples

topNStackedOthersLabel.description: Name the 'Others' chart when using Top N.

multipleLayout.description: Choose the layout and the design of small multiples

topNChartsOthersLabel.description: Name the 'Others' chart when using Top N.

showDifferenceHighlightSubtotals.description: Show separate difference highlights between result categories

differenceHighlightEllipse.description: Add an ellipse or circle to emphasize the difference highlight

differenceHighlightMargin.description: Gap between difference highlight and chart

interactionSettings.description: Enable/disable interactive features in view mode (for end-users)

previewSettings.description: The following preview features are available for you to try in this release. These features may not be ready for production use and should be tested in non production environments. Preview features might change or be removed in future releases.

licenseSettings.description: About Zebra BI visuals for Power BI
